Text.Page: You met Lein and Digory in Freeholds and received information about Rootstock.

Around this time every year, we hold Rootstock to harvest the last of the winter vegetables before we till the fields again for the spring planting.

There are lots of fun events, but cooking the fresh produce—and eating it—is the most fun, I think.

Do you want to look around the farm first? We're particularly proud of our mudroots, here at Lein's Farm.

Tell you what: If you bring me back a mudroot, I'll show you how to cook it.

Oh, nice! That's a great mudroot! It would make a nice mudroot salad.

You can make it with a salad bowl. Millia can show you how.

The secret of cooking is using the right utensils.

When you aren't sure which ones to use, just read the recipe.

Here: Take this recipe and these ingredients, and make your own salad. It's easy as can be!

Are you sure this is your first mudroot salad? It looks like you've been making them all your life!

Well, since you've mastered mudroot salad so quickly, I guess you're ready to move on to more challenging dishes!

You'll find rare ingredients and recipes here and there all around the festival and the farms. Be sure to keep an eye out! "What else is there to do at the fair?"

Well, if cooking really isn't your thing, you could always go check out the Bamarama.

Go talk to Lein. He'll give you all the details.
<PCNAME>, did you carefully follow the recipe I gave you?

Welcome! Welcome! Got tired of playing chef, eh? Well, you've come to the right place! The Bamarama is the best part of Rootstock.

You can watch thrilling matches, and if you are lucky, you can make some money on it! The rules are very simple: Just pick a fighter, and if it wins its match, you win!

And since this is your first time, I can be persuaded to give you a hint. Care to give it a try? "I might—there's still a lot of the fair to see."

Not just yet? Well, okay. Come back whenever you like.

If you're looking for something a little more hands-on, check out Digory's farm. And come back later!

Welcome to my farm!

Care to try your hand—or should I say foot?—at kick-bale? Then you came to the right place!

In this game, you kick as much straw as you can within the time limit—but don't kick it out of bounds!

Want to kick one around until you get the hang of it? "Maybe?"

What do you think? Harder than it looks, isn't it?

Sure you don't want to play again? "I'll come back later."

Hehe, no worries.

Say, , have you met my little sister, Rachlae? She has a little sky lotus garden. You should ask her about it!

Oh, hello. Did my brother Digory send you?

I'm afraid he was playing a little joke on you. Yes, I cultivate sky lotus...but my garden is up the steps here.

Yeah, I know—it only grows at very high altitudes, but it's worth cultivating, because it makes everything taste so amazing.

Here: You came all this way, so the least I can do is let you try some—even if you don't feel like gathering some yourself. "Thank you."
